long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds a tool-tip to cryptocurrency names and symbols which conveniently shows the price of that cryptocurrency.

When you are browsing websites, they may see things like:
"Have you seen the price of Bitcoin?"
"Have you heard of ETH?"

Now you can easily see the price of those currencies right there by simply hovering over the symbol or name.
